Brookhaven.Morris Brandon Elementary School:
Morris Brandon Elementary School is a public elementary school located in the Buckhead community in northwest Atlanta, Georgia, United States. Founded in 1947 as part of the Fulton County school district, it has been a part of the Atlanta Public Schools since the annexation of Buckhead in 1952.
The Main Campus, located at the intersection of Howell Mill and West Wesley roads, serves children in third to fifth grades.
